content: This task requires creating the necessary database tables and API endpoints for managing the product catalog.
I've started working on the wireframe designs. Will share the initial drafts soon.
I'm making good progress with the user authentication functionality. Should be completed by the end of the week.
I'll start performing load testing on the website to identify any performance bottlenecks.
The UI design for the mobile app is coming along nicely. Excited to share the progress soon!
I've started working on the backend development tasks. Will keep you updated on the progress.
The database setup is complete. I've defined the required data models for the project.
I'll start integrating the external APIs for authentication and data retrieval.
I'll be performing testing on the application to ensure it functions properly. Will report any bugs found.
